titleStmt.title: Advice to a painter being a satyr upon the French King, Admiral Tourvill, Irish camp at Havre de Grace, murmuring, Jacobites &c.
titleStmt.author: Savile, Henry, 1642-1687.
Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.

notesStmt.note: Doubtfully ascribed to Andrew Marvell although included in editions of his works and poems; ascribed also to Henry Savile. cf. The poems & letters of Andrew Marvell, ed. by H.M. Margoliouth, 1927, v. 1, p. 321-325; Brit. Mus. Cat. new ed.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
